INSERT INTO COMTNCLUBUSER (CLB_ID, CMMNTY_ID, EMPLYR_ID, SBSCRB_DE, OPRTR_AT, USE_AT, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM) VALUES (#clbId#, #cmmntyId#, #emplyrId#, SYSDATETIME, #oprtrAt#, #useAt#, #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATETIME)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.CLB_ID, a.CMMNTY_ID, a.CLB_NM, c.CMMNTY_NM, a.USE_AT, a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, b.USER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM, a.CLB_INTRCN as CLB_INTRCN FROM COMTNCLUB a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNCMMNTY c ON a.CMMNTY_ID = c.CMMNTY_ID WHERE 1=1
AND a.USE_AT = #useAt#
a.CLB_NM LIKE '%' || #searchWrd# || '%'
c.CMMNTY_NM LIKE '%' || #searchWrd# || '%'
ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC ) TB ) Z WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

AND a.USE_AT = #useAt#
a.CLB_NM LIKE '%' || #searchWrd# || '%'
